triples.name: Bacteria
triples.relevance: The paper studies bacterial species interactions and their competitive behaviors.

triples.name: Competition (biology)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes harnessing bacterial competition as an alternative therapeutic approach to antibiotics.

triples.name: Antibiotic
triples.relevance: The paper uses antibiotics as the comparison baseline and proposes competition as an alternative to traditional antibiotic treatment.
